subject: Madrid Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer’s 3-6, 7-5, 7-5 victory over Tomas Berdych in Madrid on Sunday moved him into second position in the rankings, behind Novak Djokovic.
snippet: Roger Federer’s 3-6, 7-5, 7-5 victory over Tomas Berdych in Madrid on Sunday moved him into second position in the rankings, behind Novak Djokovic.
